songs.title: Danger Zone
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Watch your mouth man
You’re in the danger zone
Who you talking to like that?
You’re in the danger zone
Pull your pants up sucker
You’re in the danger zone
Bout to square ass niggas
You’re in the danger zone

[Verse 1]
Get the toast from the bread haters is hollerin
Power to this rap shit nah, not smiling
Two feet for the heat six feet I’m a body him
Ted [?] from No Virtue I’m a box man
Envy no involve with it statesville pondering
Tryna get my attention without ever acknowledging
Brownsville nigga yeah we known for the violent shit
Gangs movie silent shit kill em with an honest bit
That .44 revolver shit that’s illegal with [?] clip
Fucking up a Dominican chick on top of a bed of bricks
Ten thousand dollar kick, hundred thousand dollar whip
Ten million dollar cribs niggas gotta handle wrist
She’s known to brand in this
See your commander is
Rewriting the manuscript flows they ain’t accurate
You don’t want no challenges
Thieves can’t fathom us
Gangsta all day I do not play them shenanigans, yeah

[Hook]
You in you in you in the danger zone
You in you in you in the danger zone
You in the da da danger zone
Da da da danger zone
You you in  you you in danger zone
You in the da da danger
Danger danger da da danger zone

[Verse 2]
I’m a murderer for hire
Work and desire come first and prior
I don’t own a fucking [?] sargent hire
Neighbours lit me on fire I’m a burn survivor
I was left to die inside the dirt and fertilizer
I returned from the grave with return fire
And the fire’s on one like a third tire
But I don’t have bad nerves like a first timer
I start the mother died and had her birth the birth inside her
The murders are not favorite and never work related
Learn to perpetrate it is words being terminated
I’m never overloaded I’m the fucking terminator
Never voted, never wrote a fucking term paper
But I’m a crook not a motherfucking wage earner
My black book is a real fucking page turner
I’m on the run right now got away with murder
Guess I dated more perjurors than case workers

[Hook]
You in you in you in the danger zone
You in you in you in the danger zone
You in the da da  da danger zone
Da da da danger zone
You you in  you you you in danger zone
You in the da da danger
Danger danger da da danger zone

[Verse 3]
You like this shit here
A [?] is precious as jealousy without a legacy
Respectfully my chemistry is moving as the supremacy
Blood for blood no referee
Rocking off this melody
And secondly no reaching for people like [?] energy
Originally they feeling they self must be that ecstasy
Me I was never A 1 dog not just [?]
Regretfully you doo doo and you’re lacking some integrity
And if I keep on spitting Im a catch another felony
It’s strange how my mind fear change
I’m insane at close range
Burn like a bottle of propane
[?] and cocaine I’m afraid
From a simpler plane
A lil Henny in there with some champagne
Intense stability, your chick’s a liability
Rapping over records like you got a disability
What happened to tranquility
I thought your ass was spiritual
Original a real visual your ass is pitiful

[Hook]
You you in you you you in
You you in you you you in
You you in you you you in
You you in you you you in
You in the danger zone
You in the da da da da da da danger zone
You in the da da da danger
You in you in the danger zone

[Verse 4]
Magic you must hit the nerve for a year on [?]
And gave the world what they deserve since you been on the verge
When I observe through the rifle
I merge with the mic and strike
Make you question your dog cause you thought he liked you
Step outta sight, it’s principle over fear
I see dollars and double vision
Cashiers don’t know it’s Greek
Like dick will notice the cheek
I can ride around in York with a shot o broke in the knees
We get [?] and hope he bleeds
Hit the king affiliation and make him choke on his beans
Temperaism totally, cartel groceries
Generation roasting me joking and smoking cokery
Couldn’t talk to you if I was [?] Jonesy
Got my finger next to my gold medallion rotary
The chin check [?] just checking
Reflex in my perception so intense every second
No second guessing we rocking with Psycho Les
